A. Bobby and Heena forgive Sunny after a confrontation.
B. Heena and Max are trapped on an island during a wildlife event.
C. Bobby and Heena convince their fathers to reconcile.
D. Sunny and Max are siblings.
Answer: A) Bobby and Heena forgive Sunny after a confrontation., B) Heena and Max are trapped on an island during a wildlife event., C) Bobby and Heena convince their fathers to reconcile.

Options:
A. Bobby forgave Sunny after slapping him.
B. Heena convinced her father to forget enmity with Sunny.
C. Heena slapped Sunny for telling the truth.
D. Bobby and Heena agreed to live together as brothers.
Answer: A) Bobby forgave Sunny after slapping him., C) Heena slapped Sunny for telling the truth.
